Mobilná aplikácia Tipsport je povinnosťou každého správneho stávkara, ktorý si rád staví kedykoľvek a odkiaľkoľvek chce. Moderná aplikácia od najväčšej stávkovky v Českej republike ponúka všetko podstatné. Od neprebernej ponuky športových aj mimo športových udalostí a stávkovania na predzápasové aj live kurzy až po vychytávky, ako rýchle stavenie sólovky cez minitiket, najvymakanejší cashout a uzavretie príležitosti. Po novom je umožnené vytvárať MIX tikety, teda kombinovať na jednom tikete predzápasové aj live stávky. Aplikácia umožňuje detailné nastavenie zasielania upozornení, medzi ktoré patria aj notifikácie k dôležitým udalostiam zápasov alebo závodov. 

Aplikácia vám tiež zaistí zapojenie do najväčšej stávkarskej komunity u nás. Môžete sa inšpirovať obľúbenými stávkarmi a ich analýzami, zverejnenými tiketmi v obľúbenej Tiket aréne, alebo si prečítať najzaujímavejšie blogy. Samozrejmosťou je prístup do najrozsiahlejšieho diskusného fóra a možnosť zapojiť sa do aktuálnych súťaží. 

Tipsport aplikácia obsahuje: 

• kompletnú a prehľadnú ponuku zápasov zo širokej palety športov ako sú futbal, hokej, tenis, basketbal, volejbal, hádzaná, bojové športy, rugby, snooker, motoršport, dostihy, badminton alebo aj baseball, florbal a biatlon  
• neustále sa rozširujúcu ponuku stále populárnejších ešportov  
• možnosť upraviť si poradie obľúbených športov a vyhľadávanie v predzápasovej ponuke  
• pokročilé funkcie s tiketom - cashout a uzavretie príležitosti 
• možnosť zapnutia upozornení (push notifikácií) k jednotlivým zápasom alebo celým súťažiam  
• bohaté štatistiky k predzápasovým príležitostiam spolu s informáciami, na čo stavili ostatní stávkari  
• všetky zásadné informácie k live príležitosti ako je aktuálny stav, live štatistiky, tracker, live stream, udalosti popisujúce priebeh zápasu alebo závodu  
• veľký výsledkový servis obsahujúci priebeh zápasu alebo závodu  
• tisíce priamych prenosov s exkluzivitou pre hokejovú Tipsport extraligu  
• prehľadný zoznam stavených tiketov s jasnou indikáciou stavu  
• upravenú sekciu Môj účet s prístupom k rýchlemu vkladu alebo výberu peňazí z herného účtu, ku kompletnej histórii transakcií a všetkým dôležitým správam  
• široké možnosti nastavení – prepínanie medzi svetlým a tmavým vzhľadom, radenie príležitostí na tikete a zobrazovanie ďalších informácií pri príležitostiach na tikete  
• nastavenie upozornení pre zasielanie push notifikácií a správ do aplikácie zo všetkých oblastí  
• fórum s vylepšenou klávesnicou pre rýchle pridanie tiketu alebo analýzy, možnosť využívať súkromné správy pre chatovanie s viacerými používateľmi naraz

The APP of Dolomiti Superski is supposed to be a real online ski guide for those who want to discover the world’s largest ski carousel and is supported by all the operating systems of the most common smart phones. It has new graphics and a modern navigation: horizontal movements (swipe) allow users to switch from one of the 12 ski areas of Dolomiti Superski to the next in numerical order, while vertical movements (scroll) lead to various menu options, functions and services within the chosen ski area. If the GPS function of the device is activated, when the APP is launched, the system will lead to a contents page for the Dolomiti Superski ski area in which the user is located. One can login through the "MyDolomiti" community, after having registered (free of charge) to use the services. The APP offers useful information such as the open/closed status of individual lifts and slopes in real time, opening hours of the lifts, breaks, weather forecasts, points of interest such as ski schools, ski rentals, infopoints, Pick-up Box, as well as descriptions and contacts. 
The user will also find other interesting and popular functions, such as the Performance Check, Tracking option to record the route taken while skiing, Routing which will navigate you to a predetermined point on the slopes. By reaching certain goals with the "Tracking" function, the user will be assigned interesting Badges - a great way to challenge yourself! And finally, you get to play too since the registered members of the APP-community can also have fun with the APP's game functions, creating their network of friends, who must also be registered members and in possession of a Dolomiti Superski ski pass and challenging each other throughout the ski season.
Discover the new APP’s full potential watching the video tutorials.

summary.label:
RECORD, ANALYZE, IMPROVE


Ochy offers runners, coaches, physiotherapist the possibility to evaluate running technique from anywhere using video and AI in order to prevent injuries or improve performance. This is an analysis of the gait and full body. The app identifies the runner’s weak points and provides details and what they should do to improve. The app provides the following analysis and running metrics:
-	Foot strike – understand how the foot lands on the ground (heel, midfoot, forefoot) in relations to your center of mass
-	Head position – Are you looking down when your run or straight ahead
-	Back position – Do you have a good enough forward lean
-	Arm position – Are your arms relaxed
-	Heel kick – Are you driving your legs up far enough
-	Front leg flexion – is your leg too bent causing you to lose energy
-	Ground contact time – how much time are you spending on the ground
-	Time between steps – How much time you take between the steps
-	Vertical oscillation – Are you doing too much bouncing
-	Leg cycle – Do you have a good leg flow


HOW IT WORKS

-	Record or upload a video (7 seconds maximum) of yourself running
-	Receive a detailed analysis of your running technique within 60 seconds

The core AI technology computer vision to capture the movement of a person regardless of where they are running (on the road, forest, track, treadmill etc). This is then plugged into a biomechanics algorithm that considers every part of the body plus the person’s height, weight, gender, and running speed so we provide a diagnosis-specific for them. With that, the algorithm points out which area of the body the movement is not optimal for the running activity they are doing. Base on the analysis, we identify the weak points of the person and use an improved algorithm to provide a specific muscle groups to work on to improve the weak points so the person can run more efficiently in order to prevent injuries or improve performance.
Who is the product for?
•	Coaches: Help a coach to understand their athlete and create a good training program
•	Runners: Help runners who don’t have a coach to evaluate their technique and have a plan to improve
•	Medical Professionals: Help medical professionals (kine, Osteo) to evaluate the technique of their patients and provide the good rehab

Týmuj is an app for easy organisation and communication in sports teams and groups. Suitable for any sport. Managers, leaders or coaches can easily manage their teams directly from their mobile phones. The application can be used in combination with the web platform available at www.tymuj.cz.
 
MULTIPLE TEAMS WITHIN SINGLE ACCOUNT
Sports organisers can create any number of teams and control them from a single account in the application. Likewise, athletes can have all their activities in one place. Regular members can be made into team managers and given the right to create events, invite new members, etc.

TEAM LINE-UP
You can see all team members in one place, including their profile information. The number of team members is not limited. Optional fields can be set for each team, such as the player´s post or jersey number.
Send an invitation to the team easily by e-mail, via SMS or, for example, Whatsapp. New members can either only be invited to the team, or they can be invited directly to participate in existing scheduled events. In a team, you can also restrict the display of some details to its members and increase the feeling of privacy.

SUBGROUPS
You have the option of creating subgroups (for example, A team and B team or field players and goalkeepers) within the list of members and planning events for them separately or setting a separate participation limit for them.
 
TRAININGS AND MATCHES AT A GLANCE
If you are a coach or manager, you can easily plan events and invite players or teammates directly from your mobile.
As a member of the team, you will quickly learn when and where you play or train. You are receiving up-to-date information on whether the event capacity is already full or if the event has been cancelled for some reason. You can save each event to your calendar on your mobile phone.
 
ATTENDANCE
You will confirm your participation in the event within a few seconds. With mobile attendance, team leaders will know in time who they can count on and who is skipping this time and why. You can also assign non-team members to events. If the event is full, the applicant can join the queue and will be informed if the place becomes available. You can easily find out who you can rely on based on the statistics.
 
NOTIFICATION
The notification system speeds up the response to new events in the team. The invitation to the event, created by the captain, will come to everyone on time. Everyone will also learn about the change or cancellation of the event immediately. No one can make excuses for not knowing about something. Choose for yourself whether you want to receive notifications directly to your mobile phone or by e-mail.

NOTICE-BOARD
Write and share important articles, information or instructions for the team. Add files or create a quick poll, so you know what new colour of jerseys the team prefers.

TEAM CHAT AND CHAT FOR EVENTS
You can discuss everything important in one place. Let team members know about new messages with the notification system.
You can use a separate chat for each match or training. You can agree, for example, who takes the car or what the tactics will be.

GALLERY
A gallery is available for each team, in which they simply create albums and upload photos from matches or camps.

WALLET
In the wallet module, you can easily create payment requests for membership fees or for the gym. You will have a clear record of payments and you will see who owes or how much is left in the team wallet.

PARTICIPATION STATISTICS
The application automatically calculates and visualizes the trend of participation in the last 20 events to which the user has been invited. It is possible to distinguish between overall and team-specific statistics.

LANGUAGE MUTATIONS
Týmuj is now available in Czech, Slovakian and English. Other languages ​​will follow.

No human interaction is involved in the generation of predictions, and we solely rely on our algorithms. Algorithms work in a way so that predictions are generated consistently, which is not really feasible when predictions are made by humans. Our AI algorithms look at a large number of features when generating predictions and can learn how each feature may affect the result of a basketball game. Predictions are renewed periodically and past prediction results are openly shared in our application. With out app, you don’t need to spend so much time on game and team stats, basketball props, and game highlights. Basketball Betting Tipster automates the performance analysis work for you so that you can focus on thinking how to use the predictions to develop the best basketball betting strategy to beat the bookies. Whenever possible, we even share reference betting odds for each prediction so that you can even consider odds when using the predictions when developing your basketball betting strategy.

Game Result Predictions

Our AI algorithms generate the likelihood of each basketball team to win the game that will be played. These predictions are probabilistic and shared as a percentage figure for each team. Since there is always a winner in basketball games, the team having a winning probability that is greater than 50% is the expected winner based on our algorithms. Our algorithms expect that a given game is riskier for betting when these probabilities are close to each other (say 48% and 52%). As the winning probability increases and gets closer to 100% for a given team, it indicates a stronger confidence on the prediction for that team to win the game. Whenever it is possible, reference odds are made available as well from bookmakers for each game result prediction.

Total Score Predictions

Beside game result predictions, we even share total score predictions for each game. It is very challenging to be very accurate on total score predictions so that beside the total score prediction, we even share a prediction interval for the total score itself. For example, if the total score prediction is – say – 180 for a given basketball game, our algorithms also provide an interval i.e. the total score of the game is expected to be between 168 and 192. In this way, you can try to pick the best bet for total score betting for basketball games. Whenever it is possible, reference betting odds are made available for total score predictions as well in our mobile app.

REGISTRÁCIA
